IMetaData - interface multimonster.common.media.IMetaData.
The IMetaData interface combines read and write access for MetaData Properties.
IMetaDataReader - interface multimonster.common.media.IMetaDataReader.
The IMetaDataReader allows retrieving a MetaData Property Object with a given key.
IMetaDataWriter - interface multimonster.common.media.IMetaDataWriter.
The IMetaDataWriter Interface allows setting a MetaData Property Object with a given key.
